metadata.title: CVE-2024-3859 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: On 32-bit versions there were integer-overflows that led to anout-of-bounds-read that potentially could be triggered by a malformedOpenType font. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 125, Firefox ESR <115.10, and Thunderbird < 115.10.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
